review:
My father was admitted in Manipal hospital Sarjapur road, following a fracture on his left leg. He was operated and discharged on 11th June 2023. While my apologies for not remembering the attendeders and nurses, I can not forget the splendid help rendered by the Sri. Dr. Mallesh and happen to interact with him only after my father's discharge. Subsequent reviews were very well taken care of by him. A very friendly and extraordinarily patient to attend patiens.

Manipal Hospitals need more and more of such people

Dr. Mallesh was very friendly and polite and attentively listened to all the information we gave. 
My brother was in complete pain and unable to rotate his legs and not even allowing anyone to touch his ankle joints, we got the x-rays in nearby diagnostic centre and rushed to his clinic. He didn’t suggest any unwanted additional Scan’s and instead he examined thoroughly and conducted couple of movement test and shared his observations in very understandable manner for common man. 
There are only few doctors, who speak transparently with patients and make them feel comfortable, patients will start feeling that they are already half cured.  I would highly recommend Dr.Mallesh for any ortho related issues...Thank you.

We have consulted Dr.Mallesh for my grand mother knee replacement surgery, he listens to patients concerns and address them all with smiling face with no attitude which gives more comfort to patients before surgery. Dr was very polite and to my surprise he apologized for being just 10 minutes late to our scheduled appointment.To be honest, we visited for a second opinion but the doctor explained all the procedures in great detail and also suggested all the options. We got both knee replacement done.Now she walks without a crutch and most importantly pain-free.I would highly recommend him for any orthopaedic related consultation and surgery.

My Mother , who is around 65 years old and got severe pain in left leg & was not able to stand for more than 10 to 20 mins and lack of sleep because of this pain. Contacted multiple Doctors and they could not able to find the cause for the pain. We visited him and he was the one who checked all the previous reports and also inquired about each and every problem she had. Dr Mallesh finally identified the cause and treated well and cured the pain. Dr Mallesh has been helpful throughout the process and open to query's all the time. I thank him for the treatment. He is the most cooperative doctor I have ever seen. More than a doctor he is very good human being, he knows about situation of people , treat them very friendly and always support & push them to get well.
Very good  docter patient's with talking wonderfull first time tretment  in docter

I have taken many appointments with Dr Mallesh for my father and mother. His expertise helped a lot to both my parents. I have recommended Dr. Mallesh to my relatives and friends and they also have the exact opinion. His advice giving us good health since many years. Dr. Mallesh listens very well to the pain point and follow up diagnosis, medication have helped us to recover very well. Thank you Dr. Mallesh.
Doctor was good and helped me in understanding the problem and xray gave me clear picture of the issue and guided me on taking care of the sprain.
Very good experience, pays more attention to the problem and provides more insight to understand issue and it's reason. Gives good advice to overcome the issue.
Very friendly. Last year in August knee replacement surgery ( TKR) of my wife and sister in law  were done very successfully.  We are very much satisfied with the doctor consultations and follow up.
